thread.title: Mohan Pyari Kaul
thread.title_full: FlyDealFare.com reviewed by Mohan Pyari Kaul

author: Mohan Pyari Kaul
title: Mohan Pyari Kaul
text: Had a very nice experience with your representative Mr. Parm, he is a very nice person to deal with and very cooperative in a very professional manner. I will recommend my friends and colleagues also to him and will have all the travels in future through him. I wish him a very sucessful career.
